title: The Iconic City Hills & Downtown
subtitle: Steep streets, famous houses, and urban density
description: A 2.5-hour dive into the classic San Francisco experience. Navigate incredibly steep hills, pass the most famous Victorian homes, drive the 'crookedest street', and feel the pulse of downtown.

stops.name: Union Square
stops.description: The bustling center of San Francisco's retail and theater district. A dynamic urban starting point.

stops.name: Chinatown (Dragon's Gate)
stops.description: Drive up Grant Avenue past the famous Dragon's Gate, entering the oldest Chinatown in North America.

stops.name: Coit Tower (Telegraph Hill)
stops.description: Brave the winding drive up Telegraph Hill to the base of this iconic Art Deco monument for incredible bay views.

stops.name: Lombard Street
stops.description: A must-do driving experience: slowly descend the famous eight hairpin turns of the 'crookedest street in the world'.

stops.name: Alamo Square (Painted Ladies)
stops.description: Park along the square to view the iconic row of Victorian 'Painted Ladies' houses with the downtown skyline in the background.
